jcr:content.jcr:title: Popcorn and Pajamas: the Green Carpet Debut PLUS Dinner and a Movie!

data.details:
Green Lights, Camera, Action!

Join Latitude 360 and the Girl Scouts of Gateway Council as they roll out the green carpet (and green bubble wall) on Family night for Popcorn and Pajamas: Dinner and a Movie at Latitude 360*. Girls 12 and under will receive a free meal and/or movie ticket, along with a $5 game card, with every paying adult (up to two girls per adult).

Movie begins at 4pm. Arrive early to ensure admission and seating.**

Bring your camera to take photos on the Hollywood style Green Carpet, which will be making itsâ€™ debut at this event.

The Green Carpet, bowling and the game room is open to all ages. Bowling will be discounted to $5 per game.

This is an opportunity to receive multiple patches: Movie Night patch, Bowling patch, or other patches as appropriate, at the discretion of Troop Leaders.

**Movie theater seating is reserved to 60 participants. Participants are welcome to wear their pajamas while they watch a family friendly movie. Latitude 360 is a multi-entertainment venue located across from The Avenues Mall.
